title: Complete eBay feed API integration for AI agents with MCP server
description:
Need help? Want access to this workflow + many more paid workflows + live Q&A sessions with a top verified n8n creator?

[Join the community](https://www.skool.com/beyond-nodes-automation-lab-2006/about)

Complete MCP server exposing 23 Feed API operations to AI agents.

## âš¡ Quick Setup

1. **Import** this workflow into your n8n instance
2. **Credentials** Add Feed API credentials
3. **Activate** the workflow to start your MCP server
4. **Copy** the webhook URL from the MCP trigger node
5. **Connect** AI agents using the MCP URL

## ðŸ”§ How it Works

This workflow converts the Feed API into an MCP-compatible interface for AI agents.

â€¢ **MCP Trigger**: Serves as your server endpoint for AI agent requests
â€¢ **HTTP Request Nodes**: Handle API calls to https://api.ebay.com{basePath}
â€¢ **AI Expressions**: Automatically populate parameters via `$fromAI()` placeholders
â€¢ **Native Integration**: Returns responses directly to the AI agent

## ðŸ“‹ Available Operations (23 total)

### ðŸ”§ Customer_Service_Metric_Task (3 endpoints)

â€¢ **GET /customer_service_metric_task**: Get Customer Service Metric Task
â€¢ **POST /customer_service_metric_task**: Create/Search Customer Service Metric Task
â€¢ **GET /customer_service_metric_task/{task_id}**: Get {Task Id}

### ðŸ”§ Inventory_Task (3 endpoints)

â€¢ **GET /inventory_task**: Get Inventory Task
â€¢ **POST /inventory_task**: Create/Search Inventory Task
â€¢ **GET /inventory_task/{task_id}**: Get {Task Id}

### ðŸ”§ Order_Task (3 endpoints)

â€¢ **GET /order_task**: Get Order Task
â€¢ **POST /order_task**: Create/Search Order Task
â€¢ **GET /order_task/{task_id}**: This method retrieves the task details and status of the specified task

### ðŸ”§ Schedule (6 endpoints)

â€¢ **GET /schedule**: Get Schedule Template
â€¢ **POST /schedule**: Create/Search Schedule
â€¢ **DELETE /schedule/{schedule_id}**: This method deletes an existing schedule
â€¢ **GET /schedule/{schedule_id}**: This method retrieves schedule details and status of the specified schedule
â€¢ **PUT /schedule/{schedule_id}**: This method updates an existing schedule
â€¢ **GET /schedule/{schedule_id}/download_result_file**: This method downloads the latest result file generated by the schedule

### ðŸ”§ Schedule_Template (2 endpoints)

â€¢ **GET /schedule_template**: Get Schedule Template
â€¢ **GET /schedule_template/{schedule_template_id}**: This method retrieves the details of the specified template

### ðŸ”§ Task (6 endpoints)

â€¢ **GET /task**: Upload Task File
â€¢ **POST /task**: This method creates an upload task or a download task without filter criteria
â€¢ **GET /task/{task_id}**: This method retrieves the details and status of the specified task
â€¢ **GET /task/{task_id}/download_input_file**: Get Download Input File
â€¢ **GET /task/{task_id}/download_result_file**: Get Download Result File
â€¢ **POST /task/{task_id}/upload_file**: Create/Search Upload File

## ðŸ¤– AI Integration

**Parameter Handling**: AI agents automatically provide values for:
â€¢ Path parameters and identifiers
â€¢ Query parameters and filters
â€¢ Request body data
â€¢ Headers and authentication

**Response Format**: Native Feed API responses with full data structure

**Error Handling**: Built-in n8n HTTP request error management

## ðŸ’¡ Usage Examples

Connect this MCP server to any AI agent or workflow:

â€¢ **Claude Desktop**: Add MCP server URL to configuration
â€¢ **Cursor**: Add MCP server SSE URL to configuration
â€¢ **Custom AI Apps**: Use MCP URL as tool endpoint
â€¢ **API Integration**: Direct HTTP calls to MCP endpoints

## âœ¨ Benefits

â€¢ **Zero Setup**: No parameter mapping or configuration needed
â€¢ **AI-Ready**: Built-in `$fromAI()` expressions for all parameters
â€¢ **Production Ready**: Native n8n HTTP request handling and logging
â€¢ **Extensible**: Easily modify or add custom logic
